name: Flappy Journey
description:
Flappy Bird and friends are bored of flying between two pipes so they decided to make a new beginning. But the place they live is full of saw blades and rockets! They need your help to find a better place.

Controls are simple: Just tap the screen to flap.

In your way, you won't be alone. There are powerups!

Two game modes: Infinitive and challange mode. In infinitive mode, you take a tour of the pack's place. In challange mode, you should flap to beat the challenging levels! 

Why you should donate?

We need money to improve our game's quality such as getting some better development enviroments and assets.

In fact, dollar is very valuable in our country. With only 1 dollar, you can buy 60 packs of chewing gum. That means every dollar you donate us is multiplied by about six.

If you like our game and want to improve it, please donate. Thank you.
